Lucas Kimeli Rotich (amụrụ na 16 Eprel na afọ 1990), Kapsoiyo Village, Elgeyo Marakwet County bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke maara nke ọma na mita 5000.

O meriri nrite ọlaọcha na mita 3000 na 2007 World Youth Championships, ọla nchara na asọmupi ụmụaka na 2008 World Cross Country Championships ma mechie nke isii na mita 5000 na 2009 World Athletics Final
Ọ gbara ọsọ na asọmupi ụmụ nwoke na 2010 World Cross Country Championships, mana ọ gwụchara asọmupi ahụ n'ọnọdụ nke iri na abụọ na mmerụ ahụ
Mgbe ọ gbakere, o setịpụrụ ihe kachasị mma nke onwe ya karịa 3000 m, 5000 m na 10,000 m na circuit Europe.

O meriri na Tuskys Cross Country na Nọvemba na afọ 2010 ma lekwasị anya n'ịrụ ọrụ nke ọma na 2011 World Cross Country Championships. O nwere akara atọ kachasị elu na Cross Internacional Zornotza na Jenụwarị. O rughị eru maka ihe omume ụwa ma gbanwee uche ya na ịgba ọsọ n'okporo ụzọ, mezue ọkara marathon mbụ na City-Pier-City Loop na oge nke 59:44 nkeji maka ebe nke ise. Ọ gara United States wee mechie n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ na Beach to Beacon 10K na oge nke 27:56 nkeji. Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke 2011 nke Falmouth Road Race ma mechie dị ka onye nke abụọ na Portugal Half Marathon na Septemba. Ọ gbara ọsọ na Lisbon Half Marathon (ọsọ ọzọ dị mkpa n'obodo ahụ) na Machị wee ruo nke atọ na podium.

Oge kachasị mma ya bụ nkeji 3:43.64 na mita 1,500, nke o nwetara na Mee 2008 na Rehlingen; nkeji 7:35.57 na mita 3000, nke o mere na Mee 2011 na Doha; nkeji 12:55.06 na mita 5000 site na 2010 Bislett Games; na nkeji 26:43.98 na mita 10,000, nke o ruru na Septemba 2011 na nzukọ Brussels Diamond League.
